old:
<COL 78f5ff>レスタニア第二節：「命の行方」到達！</COL>

　“友の命は尊き煌めきとなりて
　　おおいなる白竜のもとへと還った
　　一方、ある友は闇に囚われ神殿を去った――

　　オークの首領倒れども、脅威は未だ衰えず
　　そして今、理乱す者の影がしずかに世界を
　　覆わんとしている――大陸の命運は、第三節へ”
new:
<COL 78f5ff>Lestania Part 2: "The Course of Life" Reached!</COL>

"The life of a friend turned into a precious sparkle
and returned to the presence of the mighty White Dragon.
Meanwhile, another friend, captured by darkness, left the temple--

Although the leader of the Orcs has fallen, the threat has not diminished
And now, the shadows of those who disrupt order silently seek to engulf the world
The fate of the continent is at stake."

old:
今後あなたの前に現れる敵は
いっそう強さを増してゆきます

装具を固め、戦技を磨いて
次なる戦いに備えましょう

白竜神殿の商店区にいる、《鑑定交換》商人
グレゴリーが希少なジュエリーを扱っています
いずれも冒険に役立つ強力な品ですので
ぜひ、その人物と会ってみてください
new:
The enemies that will appear before you in the future will become stronger and stronger.

Strengthen your armor and hone your fighting skills,
Prepare for the next battle.

In the shopping district of the White Dragon Temple, the "Appraisal Exchange" merchant Gregory sells rare jewelry.
All of these items are powerful and useful for adventures.
Please meet him!
